content: A Psalm; a Song at the Dedication of the House.  of David.
And have not let my enemies rejoice over me.
I cried to You for help, and You healed me.
, You have brought up my soul from Sheol;
You have kept me alive, that I would not go down to the pit.
Sing praise to the , you His godly ones,
And praise the mention of His holiness.
For His anger is but for a moment,
His favor is for a lifetime;
Weeping may last for the night,
But a shout of joy  in the morning.
